mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD(CATEGORY_S_NO, CATEGORY_U_NO, TITLE, CONTENT, USER_NO) VALUES(#{categorySNo}, #{categoryUNo}, #{title}, #{content}, #{userNo})
mapper.select: SELECT BOARD_NO, NICK_NAME, CATEGORY_S_NAME, TITLE, CONTENT, CREATE_DATE, READ_COUNT FROM BOARD B JOIN MEMBER M USING (USER_NO) JOIN SUB_CATEGORY USING(CATEGORY_S_NO) WHERE B.CATEGORY_U_NO = 8 AND B.STATUS = 'Y';
